alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 31 at 1:28PM MST until January 01 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM CST /10 AM MST/ TO 7 PM CST /6 PM MST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast New Mexico and southwest and western Texas. * WHEN...From 11 AM CST /10 AM MST/ to 7 PM CST /6 PM MST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County
